author: Ben Kuchera
title: The best VR device is hard to find, at the worst time
description: Folks are struggling with isolation and boredom during quarantine, but the best device to help is sold out, with soaring prices on the secondary market. VR’s time is now, but a lack of supply may limit how much the market can grow in the next few months.
content: The Oculus Quest which is the virtual reality headset I recommend to just about everyone whod like to buy a VR headset has been the best useful piece of technology Ive had around the house during the past few week of lockdown. Its the one piece of technology … [+5224 chars]
